attributes.action: Cancel £900,000 plans to repaint the plane used by the PM and Senior Royals.
attributes.additional_details: Seeing as we are heading for the greatest recession in recorded history, spending this money in such a way is incredibly detrimental. Additionally, thousands are dying as a result of Coronavirus and the money would be better used aiding those affected.
attributes.background: The government plans on spending £900,000 on painting the plane used by the PM red, white and blue. We call for these plans to be cancelled and have the money rerouted into combatting Coronavirus throughout the country and supporting the victims.

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
